installApp.title: Install on Home Screen
installApp.description: Use Receipto like an app: iPhone (Safari) tap Share, then Add to Home Screen. Android (Chrome) tap menu (three dots), then Add to Home screen or Install app.
installApp.tip: Open Receipto from your home screen for faster access and a full-screen experience.

step1.title: Track Your Expenses
step1.description: Scan QR codes from Serbian fiscal receipts for automatic data extraction. You can also add expenses manually.
step1.tip: Scanning QR codes gives you the best results - all items, prices, and store info are captured automatically.

step2.title: Organize by Category
step2.description: Create categories like Groceries, Transport, or Entertainment. Set monthly budgets to keep your spending in check.

step3.title: Never Miss a Warranty
step3.description: Add your product warranties with purchase dates. We'll help you track expiration dates so you never miss a claim.

step4.title: Split Expenses Together
step4.description: Create groups for family, roommates, or trips. Track who paid, see balances, and settle up easily - like popular expense sharing apps.

step5.title: Track Prices
step5.description: See price history for products across different stores. Find where you can save money on your regular purchases.
step5.tip: The more receipts you scan, the better your price insights become!

signIn.title: Welcome back
signIn.subtitle: Sign in to your account to continue

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link
forgotPassword.successMessage: Password reset link sent! Check your email inbox.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password
resetPassword.invalidLinkMessage: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your expenses and spending patterns

rank.title: Your Rank
rank.topTier: Top tier reached. Keep the streak alive.

details.noStatus: You are in the warm-up phase. Keep scanning to unlock your first rank.
details.statusC: You reached Receipt Ranger. Your tracking habit is now a real system.
details.statusB: You reached Budget Pathfinder. You are tracking with high consistency.
details.statusA: You reached Ledger Legend. This is elite-level tracking discipline.

budgetProgress.title: Budget Tracker
budgetProgress.selectToView: Select a category to view budget status

receipts.title: Expenses
receipts.subtitle: View and manage all your expenses.

gallery.noQrFound: No QR code found in this image. Try a clearer photo.
gallery.invalidImage: Could not read this image. Please try another file.
gallery.error: Failed to scan QR code from image

receipts.convertedDisclaimer: Amounts in other currencies are converted using approximate exchange rates. Actual totals may vary.
receipts.noReceiptsText: Scan a QR code or add a receipt manually to get started
receipts.archivedGroupLocked: This receipt is in an archived group. Unarchive the group to edit or delete.
receipts.recurringLocked: This receipt was auto-generated from a recurring expense. Manage it from the Recurring page.

modal.editDescription: Update the receipt details or delete it.
modal.paidByHelp: Who actually paid for this expense
modal.splitAmongHelp: Uncheck members not included in this expense
modal.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the receipt from {{store}}? This action cannot be undone.

qrScanner.scanDescription: Choose scan mode and point your camera at the receipt.
qrScanner.title: Scan QR Code
qrScanner.description: Point your camera at the receipt QR code to scan it.
qrScanner.ocrDescription: Point your camera at the PFR section of the receipt. Make sure the text is clear and readable.
qrScanner.scanningPfr: Scanning for PFR values... Hold steady
qrScanner.processingDescription: Fetching data from the fiscal server. This may take a few seconds.
qrScanner.portalDelayHint: The receipt may take up to 2 minutes to appear on the fiscal server.
qrScanner.retryCancelled: Retry canceled. You can scan again.
qrScanner.privacyNotice: Your image is not stored. We only extract the data from the QR code to create your receipt.
qrScanner.cameraFallbackApplied: Applied basic camera mode for this device.
qrScanner.scanSuccessDescription: The receipt data will be extracted shortly.
qrScanner.scanError: Failed to create receipt from QR code
qrScanner.nonFiscalQrError: This is not a Serbian fiscal receipt QR code.
qrScanner.torchUnsupportedHint: Some cameras and browsers do not expose flashlight in web mode. Try switching camera or scanning from gallery.
qrScanner.permissionHint: Tip: To avoid being asked for camera permission every time, select "Allow" and check "Remember this decision" in your browser's permission dialog.
qrScanner.cameraSlowTitle: Camera is taking too long to start
qrScanner.cameraSlowDescription: This can happen on some devices. Try again, or scan a QR code from your photo gallery instead.

pfrEntry.title: Manual Entry via PFR Number
pfrEntry.description: Enter receipt data to verify and add it to the system
pfrEntry.apiNotReady: PFR verification API is currently under development
pfrEntry.errorPfrRequired: PFR receipt number is required (all 3 parts)

templateSelector.title: Select Template
templateSelector.description: Choose a template to prefill receipt details
templateSelector.noTemplatesText: Create templates in the Templates page to quickly add receipts

receipts.bulkDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} receipts? This action cannot be undone.

guide.title: CSV Import Guide
guide.description: Import receipts from a CSV file. The file must contain specific columns.
guide.columnCurrency: currency - Currency code, e.g. RSD, EUR (optional, defaults to RSD)
guide.columnCategoryName: categoryName - Category name, must match existing category (optional)
guide.dateFormats: Supported date formats: YYYY-MM-DD, DD/MM/YYYY, DD.MM.YYYY

viewer.title: Receipt Copy
viewer.description: Digital copy of the fiscal receipt. You can print or share it.

templates.title: Templates
templates.subtitle: Create templates for faster receipt entry
templates.noTemplatesText: Create your first template to speed up receipt entry

modal.createDescription: Create a template for quick receipt entry
modal.name: Template Name
modal.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the template "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

categories.title: Categories
categories.subtitle: Organize your receipts by category
categories.noCategoriesText: Create your first category to get started

modal.createDescription: Add a new category to organize your receipts.
modal.editDescription: Update the category details or delete it.
modal.name: Name
modal.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
modal.deleteConfirmSimple: Are you sure you want to delete the category '{{name}}'? This action cannot be undone.
modal.deleteConfirmWithReceipts: Are you sure you want to delete the category '{{name}}'? All receipts associated with this category will become uncategorized. This action cannot be undone.
modal.deleteWithReceiptsDescription: The category '{{name}}' has {{count}} receipt(s). Please reassign them to another category or leave them uncategorized.
modal.monthlyBudgetHelp: Set a monthly spending limit for this category (optional)

groups.title: Group Spending
groups.subtitle: Split expenses with family, roommates, or friends
groups.noGroupsText: Create a group to share expenses with others

guide.title: How Group Spending Works
guide.step1Description: Set up a group for your household, trip, or any shared expense scenario. Invite members by email.
guide.step2Description: When adding a receipt, assign it to a group. Track who paid and let the app calculate who owes what.
guide.step3Description: View balances at a glance. Get optimized payment suggestions to settle all debts with minimal transactions.
guide.tip: Tip: Perfect for roommates splitting bills, couples tracking household expenses, or friends on a trip. Each group has its own currency, so you can manage different scenarios separately.

modal.createDescription: Create a new expense group to share with others.
modal.name: Name
modal.defaultCurrencyHelp: This currency will be pre-selected when adding receipts to this group
modal.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? All receipts will be removed from this group. This action cannot be undone.

detail.noReceipts: You haven't added any expenses yet
detail.noReceiptsDescription: Scan a QR code or add an expense manually to get started.
detail.removeMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the group?
detail.leaveConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave this group? You will no longer have access to the group's receipts and statistics.

balances.noExpenses: No expenses in this group yet
balances.settlementsHelp: These are optimized payment suggestions to settle all balances with minimum transactions.

settlements.title: Settle Debts
settlements.confirmDescription: Record a payment of {{amount}} from {{from}} to {{to}}?

archive.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to archive "{{name}}"? Archived groups won't appear in your main list but can be restored later.
archive.unarchiveDescription: Are you sure you want to unarchive "{{name}}"? The group will appear in your main list again.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Set your preferred currency for displaying amounts
currency.label: Display Currency
currency.help: Choose which currency to use throughout the app

language.title: Language
language.label: Display Language
language.help: Select the language for the interface

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.rankMilestonesHelp: Receive email updates when you hit receipt count milestones and unlock new ranks
notifications.warrantyRemindersHelp: Receive email reminders 30 and 7 days before your warranties expire
notifications.budgetAlertsHelp: Receive email alerts when you reach 80% or exceed your category budgets
notifications.monthlyReportHelp: Receive a summary of your finances on the 1st of each month

profile.title: Profile
profile.pictureHelp: Upload a profile picture or use your initials
profile.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload JPEG, PNG, WebP, or HEIC image.
profile.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.

address.title: Address
address.description: Your address may be used so that Receipto can send you goodies and promotional materials such as stickers, cups, and t-shirts.

profile.incomeDescription: Used for calculating your savings rate on the Savings page.

rank.title: Receipt rank
rank.topTier: Top tier reached. Keep the streak alive.

descriptions.noStatus: Strong start. Scan {{remaining}} more receipts to enter the ranked tier.
descriptions.statusC: You earned this by scanning at least 50 receipts. Consistency is paying off.
descriptions.statusB: You earned this by scanning at least 75 receipts. Your tracking discipline is elite.
descriptions.statusA: You earned this for scanning 100+ receipts. This is the highest rank.

security.title: Security
security.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.deleteAccountWarning: Deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone. This will:
dangerZone.deleteItem1: Delete all your receipts and expense data
dangerZone.deleteItem2: Delete all your warranties and their images
dangerZone.deleteItem3: Delete all groups you own (including all receipts in those groups)
dangerZone.deleteItem4: Remove you from any groups you're a member of
dangerZone.confirmPrompt: Type DELETE to confirm account deletion:

warranties.title: Warranties
warranties.subtitle: Track and manage your product warranties
warranties.noWarrantiesText: Add your first warranty to start tracking expiration dates

modal.createDescription: Add a new product warranty to track.
modal.editDescription: Update warranty details or upload a new image.
modal.notesPlaceholder: Additional notes about the product or warranty
modal.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the warranty for "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
modal.imageSlots: Add up to 3 files (images or PDFs)
modal.heicNotice: HEIC images cannot be previewed but will be converted after upload.

guide.title: CSV Import Guide
guide.description: Import warranties from a CSV file. The file must contain specific columns.
guide.columnPurchaseDate: purchaseDate - Purchase date in YYYY-MM-DD format (required)
guide.columnWarrantyExpires: warrantyExpires - Expiration date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional)
guide.columnWarrantyDuration: warrantyDuration - Duration in months (optional, used if warrantyExpires is empty)
guide.columnFileUrls: fileUrls - File URLs separated by semicolon (optional)
guide.dateFormats: Supported date formats: YYYY-MM-DD, DD/MM/YYYY, DD.MM.YYYY
guide.defaultDuration: If neither warrantyExpires nor warrantyDuration is provided, default is 24 months.

users.title: Users
users.subtitle: View and manage all registered users
users.searchPlaceholder: Search users by name or email...
users.createDescription: Add a new user to the system. Admin users have access to this panel.
users.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the user {{email}}? All their data including receipts, groups, and warranties will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
users.detailsSubtitle: Detailed user profile, expenses, and spending insights

usage.title: Feature Usage
usage.description: How this user is using warranties and recurring expenses

analytics.title: Spending Analytics
analytics.description: Where this user spends the most, grouped by category

form.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

ratings.title: Ratings
ratings.subtitle: View and manage app ratings from users

announcements.title: Announcements
announcements.subtitle: Manage system announcements visible to all users
announcements.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this announcement? This action cannot be undone.

form.title: Title
form.titleRequired: Title is required in both languages
form.messageRequired: Message is required in both languages

settings.title: App Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure AI features and application behavior
settings.aiDescription: Control AI-powered features. When disabled, the app falls back to rule-based logic.
settings.aiCoachDescription: Use Gemini AI for personalized financial insights instead of rule-based analysis.
settings.aiCategorizationDescription: Use AI as the default method for auto-categorizing receipts. When disabled, falls back to rule-based matching.
settings.aiItemsDescription: Use AI for store name normalization, product enrichment, and shopping insights.
settings.aiSavingsDescription: Use AI to rank savings actions and personalize savings recommendations.
settings.featureFlagsDescription: Toggle application features on or off for all users.
settings.featureWarrantiesDescription: Allow users to track product warranties and expiration dates.
settings.featureItemPricingDescription: Allow users to track product prices across stores over time.
settings.featureSavingsDescription: Allow users to set savings goals and track contributions.
settings.featureRecurringExpensesDescription: Allow users to manage recurring bills and subscriptions.

categorization.basedOnPurchases: Based on your previous purchases and merchant data

insights.title: AI Categorization Insights
insights.description: See how well the AI is learning your categorization patterns
insights.noData: No categorization data yet. Scan some receipts to see AI suggestions!
insights.helpText: The AI learns from your categorization choices and will start suggesting categories automatically.
insights.avgConfidenceDesc: Higher confidence means more accurate predictions

support.title: Contact Support
support.description: Need help? Have a suggestion? Found a bug? Let us know!
support.subject: Subject
support.messagePlaceholder: Describe your issue, suggestion, or feedback in detail...
support.success: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon!
support.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

rating.title: Rate Receipto
rating.description: Help us improve by sharing your experience
rating.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us what you like or what could be better...
rating.allowPublic: Allow displaying my rating on the website
rating.error: Failed to submit rating. Please try again.

coach.title: Financial Coach
coach.noInsights: No new insights right now. Keep tracking your expenses!
coach.spendingUpMessage: Your spending is up {{percent}}% compared to last week.
coach.spendingDownMessage: Your spending is down {{percent}}% compared to last week.

items.title: Price Tracker
items.subtitle: Track prices and find savings across stores
items.scanReceiptsToTrack: Scan receipts to start tracking prices
items.noFrequentDescription: Products appear here once you buy them at least twice. Keep scanning receipts — the more data, the better the insights.

guide.title: How Price Tracker Works
guide.step1Description: Scan QR codes from your receipts. We automatically extract all items with their prices.
guide.step2Description: See price history for each product. Compare prices across different stores over time.
guide.step3Description: Get alerts when you paid more than usual. Find which store offers the best price.
guide.tip: Tip: The more receipts you scan, the more accurate your price comparisons become. Click on any product to see detailed price history and store comparison.

items.shopMultipleStoresToCompare: Shop at multiple stores to see price comparisons
items.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will also delete all price history and related data. This action cannot be undone.

migrate.title: Import Existing Receipts
migrate.description: Extract item data from your existing receipts
migrate.noNewItems: No new items found. All receipts have already been processed.

import.title: Importing Your Products
import.description: We're analyzing your receipts and using AI to clean up product names. This may take a moment.

empty.title: Get Started with Price Tracking
empty.description: This feature uses data from QR-scanned receipts. Manually entered receipts don't contain the item details needed for price tracking.
empty.step1Description: Scan QR codes from fiscal receipts to automatically pull all items and prices.
empty.step2Description: Messy POS names are transformed into readable product names using AI.
empty.step3Description: Compare prices of the same products across different stores and spot trends.
empty.importHint: This will process all your scanned receipts and extract product data.
empty.noDataWarning: You don't have any scanned receipts with item data. This feature is designed for tracking prices of the same products across different stores — scan QR codes from fiscal receipts to get started.

insights.title: Shopping Insights
insights.noInsights: No insights yet. Keep scanning receipts!

matching.title: Match Products
matching.description: Help us match similar products for better price tracking

savings.title: Savings
savings.subtitle: Set goals and track your savings progress

howItWorks.title: How savings works
howItWorks.line1: Set your monthly income and track spending from receipts to see your real savings pace.
howItWorks.line2: Receipto analyzes budget leakage, goal pace, and price opportunities to surface where money is being lost.
howItWorks.line3: Savings Copilot then suggests top actions and runs what-if simulations so you can test impact before changing habits.

snapshot.title: Monthly Overview
snapshot.noIncome: Set your monthly income in Settings to see your savings rate.

goals.title: Your Goals
goals.empty: No savings goals yet. Create one to start tracking!

goal.completedMessage: Congratulations on reaching your savings target!
goal.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this goal? All contributions will be lost. This cannot be undone.

goalModal.createDescription: Set a new savings target to work towards.
goalModal.name: Goal Name

contributions.title: Contributions
contributions.empty: No contributions yet. Start saving towards your goal!
contributions.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this contribution? The goal progress will be recalculated.

contributionModal.title: Add Contribution
contributionModal.description: Record a savings contribution towards this goal.

insights.title: Category Insights
insights.noBudget: Set a budget on {{category}} to enable auto-savings

reports.title: Monthly Reports
reports.subtitle: Review your financial performance month by month
reports.empty: Reports are generated on the 1st of each month. Check back soon!

copilot.title: Savings Copilot
copilot.subtitle: AI-assisted savings plan for {{month}}
copilot.noActions: No high-impact actions right now. Keep tracking receipts for stronger recommendations.

recurring.title: Recurring Expenses
recurring.subtitle: Manage your recurring bills and subscriptions
recurring.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will also delete all payment history.

empty.title: No recurring expenses
empty.description: Add your first recurring expense to start tracking bills and subscriptions.

info.title: How auto-pay works
info.description: Fixed-amount expenses are automatically marked as paid on their due date and appear in your expenses list. Variable-amount expenses require manual payment — you'll see them in your dashboard when they're due.

modal.createDescription: Set up a new recurring bill or subscription.
modal.editDescription: Update the details of this recurring expense.
modal.name: Name

dashboard.title: Upcoming Bills
dashboard.allCaughtUp: All caught up! No upcoming bills.
